CustomField.formula:
"Rate Schedule: "+TEXT(Rate_Schedule_EI__c) +BR()+
"SA Start Date: "+TEXT(MONTH(SA_Start_Date_EI__c))+"/" +TEXT(DAY(SA_Start_Date_EI__c))+"/" +TEXT(YEAR(SA_Start_Date_EI__c))+BR()+
IF( ISNULL(SA_End_Date_EI__c) , "SA End Date: ",
"SA End Date: "+TEXT(MONTH(SA_End_Date_EI__c))+"/" +TEXT(DAY(SA_End_Date_EI__c))+"/" +TEXT(YEAR(SA_End_Date_EI__c)))
CustomField.label: Additional Site Service Information
